pullRequest.title: Use JUnit 5 in documentation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Use Junit5 for advanced-unit-testing.mdx
Use <type://class#method()> where possible

commit.message:
Update documentation
- Use Junit5 for `advanced-unit-testing.mdx`
- Use `<type://class#method()>` where possible
